review: For a very brief time , I took treatment, very good doctor, boosted confidence. Available whenever I called him when I was having great pain.

I met an accident and got severe fracture in my left leg. My relative suggested Dr. Vijay Krishnan, he is one of the excellent, very humble, caring and experienced orthopedist doctor. He operated and inserted titanium rod in my left leg for proper healing. He boosted confidence in me. I'm very much satisfied with his treatment and happy that he is very friendly in nature. Just one month got over now slowly recovering.

We have consulted many doctors for our child for bone problem.
 Finally one of our relative(Mr.Raja MTC driver) recommended Dr.Vijay..
Now we are feeling very happy for the medicine and treatement provided which improves the child fingers to get flexible..

Thank you so much!!

Appointment was not handled well, though initial consultation was seen fast however x-ray report verification was delayed for long time which they claim to be in normal que so practo appointment system is for name sake and still have to follow regular que which delayed for more than one hour‚Ä¶
reply_text: Sorry for the inconvenience  caused... Delay in x ray occurs when the number of x ray for patients before you is more, which naturally Leads to more time for processing the reports, as for the problem from practo side, we have been experiencing  difficulty  in maintaining regular appointments  for patients who directly call the clinic and fix the timings before hand while patients from practo at times fix the appointment just hours before the consultation commences for the same time, we will make sure to address the situation  with practo, thanks for taking time to offer your valuable suggestions
